title: Next 25 Years
decision_details:
- The Hon. President apprised the Cabinet that the following action is expected to be taken with a view to achieving the progress of economic, social, cultural and political sectors in Sri Lanka within the next 25 years.

	(i)	Establishment of the following Institutions:

		*	Institute of History
		*	Institute of Economics and Trade
		*	Institute for Women and Gender
		*	University of Government and Public Policy
		*	University of Agro Technology
		*	Climate Change University
		*	Sports University

	(ii)	Introducing new legislation for the following:
 
		*	National Commission on Women's Act
		*	Gender Equality Act
		*	Women's Empowerment Act
		*	Child Care Act
		*	Climate Change Act
		*	Social Justice Commission  Act
		*	Reforestation and Tree Cover Act
		*	Living Entity Act
		Mahaweli River
		Sinharaja
		Sripada Adaviya /Peak Wilderness
		Horton Plains
		Knuckles
		Adam's Bridge
		*	Law for Ocean Resources Exploration and Management  			(within the Exclusive Economic Zone/ (EEZ)
		*	Muthurajawela (Preservation) Act
		*	Protection of Persons with Special Needs Act

	(iii)	Implementation of the following New Projects 

		*	75 Urban Forests
		*	1996 Houses in Colombo for Low Income Families 
		*	National Youth Platform Projects and Programmes
